description:
Otoo is scheduled to return to Wagnaria today! Kyoko gets excited about receiving his usual, edible souvenirs and Sota jokes about the possibility that Otoo may bring something different back with him this time. He does. It`s a new employee.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hisashiburi no Otoo to, Atarashii Baito = Yamada (!?)
Long Time No See, Otoo! The New Part-Timer, Yamada!?
久しぶりの音尾と, 新しいバイト=山田(!?)
